properties.entry: SELECT CP_NAME , DISCOUNT , CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN COUPON C ON I.CP_NO = C.CP_NO WHERE I.CP_STATUS = 'N' AND CP_ENDDATE >= SYSDATE AND USER_NO =?
SELECT COUNT(*)AS COUNT FROM(SELECT CP_NAME, DISCOUNT, CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN COUPON C ON I.CP_NO = C.CP_NO WHERE I.CP_STATUS = 'N' AND CP_ENDDATE >= SYSDATE AND USER_NO =?)
SELECT REPLY_NO , CM_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_ENROLLDATE FROM REPLY JOIN USERINFO USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT CM_NO , CMCG_NO , CM_TITLE , CM_CONTENT , CM_ENROLLDATE , CM_COUNT , USER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY JOIN USERINFO USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?

select * from (select rownum rn, b.*, c.cl_title, c.cl_thumbnailpath, um.user_name, m.mt_company from bookmark b join userinfo u on b.user_no = u.user_no join class c on b.cl_no = c.cl_no join mentor m on c.user_no = m.user_no join userinfo um on m.user_no = um.user_no where b.user_no = ? order by b.cl_likedate desc ) where rn <= 4

select b.*, c.cl_title, c.cl_thumbnailpath, um.user_name, m.mt_company from bookmark b join userinfo u on b.user_no = u.user_no join class c on b.cl_no = c.cl_no join mentor m on c.user_no = m.user_no join userinfo um on m.user_no = um.user_no where b.user_no = ? order by b.cl_likedate desc
SELECT PAY_NO , CL_NO , ISUCP_NO , PAYMENT , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE FROM PAY WHERE REFUND != 'Y'
SELECT P.PAY_NO , CL_TITLE , USER_NAME , PAY_DATE FROM PAY P JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN USERINFO U ON(C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = ?

SELECT P.PAY_NO , P.PAYMENT , P.REFUND , P.FINAL_PAYMENT , P.ORDER_NAME , P.ORDER_PHONE , P.ORDER_EMAIL , P.PAY_DATE , CL.CL_TITLE , CL.CL_PRICE , C.DISCOUNT FROM PAY P JOIN CLASS CL ON(P.CL_NO = CL.CL_NO) LEFT JOIN ISSUANCECOUPON I ON(I.ISUCP_NO = P.ISUCP_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON C ON(I.CP_NO = C.CP_NO) WHERE P.PAY_NO = ?

select * from (select rownum rn, ci.*, c.cl_title, c.cl_thumbnailpath, um.user_name, m.mt_company from class_ing ci join userinfo u on ci.user_no = u.user_no join class c on ci.cl_no = c.cl_no join mentor m on c.user_no = m.user_no join userinfo um on m.user_no = um.user_no where ci.user_no = ? order by ci.cl_startdate desc ) where rn <= 4

select ci.*, c.cl_title, c.cl_thumbnailpath, um.user_name, m.mt_company from class_ing ci join userinfo u on ci.user_no = u.user_no join class c on ci.cl_no = c.cl_no join mentor m on c.user_no = m.user_no join userinfo um on m.user_no = um.user_no where ci.user_no = ? order by ci.cl_startdate desc
UPDATE PAY SET REFUND = 'W' WHERE PAY_NO = ?
